attributes.action: Save £900,000 by not painting the raf voyager red white and blue
attributes.additional_details: Why spend £900,000 painting a plane red white and blue at a cost to the taxpayer which will more likely be scrapped within the next decade When the money could help fund Things like production of PPE In the UK and make us more self-sufficient Rather than relying on the rest of the world to get us out of problems
attributes.background: Don’t paint the RAF Voyager red white and blue put the money to better use in the current economy that we have I don’t think it’s in the best interest of the United Kingdom when people are struggling to cope with daily life due to the coronavirus

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
